ActJudges Act
SubjectMary Skipp** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Herbert Lee Skipp
PrecisGranting of an annuity to MARY SKIPP, widow of the Hon. Herbert Lee Skipp, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective October 15, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
